results.name: Number of odious divisors (A000069) of n.
comment: Number of evil divisors (A001969) of n is A000005(n)-a(n).
link: Peter J. C. Moses, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: (PARI) a(n) = sumdiv(n, d, hammingweight(d) % 2); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 06 2016
results.author: _Vladimir Shevelev_, Oct 25 2013
ext: More terms from _Peter J. C. Moses_, Oct 25 2013
